required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Comparison of Ceramic-on-Ceramic and Ceramic-on-Highly-Cross-Linked Polyethylene Bearings
clinical_study.official_title: Comparison of Ceramic-on-Ceramic and Ceramic-on-Highly-Cross-Linked Polyethylene Bearings in Primary Cementless Total Hip Arthroplasty in the Same Patients

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this prospective, randomized study was to compare the clinical and radiographic results and the prevalence of osteolysis of the cementless total hip arthroplasty with an alumina-on-alumina bearings one side and alumina-on-highly cross-linked polyethylene bearings on the other side in the young and active patients.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Intervention Model: Parallel Assignment, Masking: Single Blind (Subject), Primary Purpose: Treatment

primary_outcome.description: Comparing harris hip score before and after the intervention, and at the final follow-up, between two sides.

secondary_outcome.measure: Western Ontario and McMaster Universities Osteoarthritis Index(WOMAC)
secondary_outcome.description: WOMAC index before, and after the intervention, and between sides at the last follow-up

arm_group.description: Ceramic on Ceramic bearing coupled side of a single patient undergoing bilateral total hip arthroplasty
Ceramic on HIghly crosslinked polyethylene bearing coupled side of a single patient undergoing bilateral total hip arthroplasty

intervention.description: cementless Total Hip Arthroplasty with Ceramic on ceramic bearing

intervention.intervention_name: Ceramic on Highly crosslinked polyethylene bearing
intervention.description: Cementless Total Hip Arthroplasty with Ceramic on Highly crosslinked polyethylene bearing

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Primary hip osteoarthritis
- Secondary hip osteoarthritis
- Avascular necrosis of femoral head
Exclusion Criteria:
- Previous surgical history of hip

clinical_study.keyword: ceramic on highly cross linked polyethylene
